testsuite.name: com.ae.qa.tests.TenantAdmin.PermissionsPageTestTA
testsuite.system-out: User log in Successfully Workflows Permissions Tab is clicked Actual page title displayed on screen is: Workflow Permissions and Expected page title is: Workflow Permissions Respective Page is clicked and appropriate page is loaded properly User signed out successfully

User logged in successfully Workflows Permissions Tab is clicked Categories button is clicked Workflow category is selected successfully Groups button is selected successfully Run Permission is selected successfully Save button is clicked Actual Success Message:- Permissions updated successfully Expected Success Message:- Permissions updated successfully Permission is updated successfully User signed out successfully Catalogue Tab is clicked Workflow whose request needs to be send is selected Submit request button is clicked OK button is clicked User signed out successfully Catalogue Tab is clicked Workflow whose request needs to be send is selected Submit request button is clicked OK button is clicked User signed out successfully Execute permission is assigned to user group successfully

testcase.name: validatemodifyPermissionUserGroupTest

failure.message: Workflow not updated expected [Workflow updated successfully] but found [Value for "Cleanup Requests older than(Hours)" cannot be greater than the value [4] set by System Administrator!]
